Flow.description:
FF: 21Sep - Retain should always keep original opp owner
Flow Description: This flow is launched as a subflow from Wrap Up Opportunity Bond Subflow to handle business logic regarding retaining and reassigning of Bond opportunities.
Front-End Access: Work Opportunity button on the Opportunity page.

formulas.name: otherTemplate
formulas.expression: IF(AND(ISPICKVAL({!Get_Bond_Opportunity.Are_you_buying_your_first_home__c}, 'Yes'),{!selectedCallOutcome} != 'Spoke to Customer'), 'FHB Assign to expert Home Loan Consultant (No Answer)', 'Assign to expert Home Loan Consultant (No Answer)')

formulas.name: spokeToCustomerTemplate
formulas.expression: IF(AND(ISPICKVAL({!Get_Bond_Opportunity.Are_you_buying_your_first_home__c}, 'Yes'),{!selectedCallOutcome} = 'Spoke to Customer'), 'FHB Assign to expert Home Loan Consultant (Spoke to client)', 'Assign to expert Home Loan Consultant (Spoke to client)')

Flow.label: Reassign/Retain Subflow

OppUpdateNotifTitle
textTemplates.text: A new {!Get_Bond_Opportunity.RecordType.Name} has been assigned to you!
